titleInfo.title: Cancer Benefit for Joseph Walters and Family

mods.abstract: One color window card (black on yellow) announcing a cancer benefit for Joseph (Pat) Walters and family and a celebrity auction at the Texas Troubadour Theatre on November 24. Event features performances by Johnny Russell, Jeannie Seely, Jean Shepherd, Little Jimmy Dickens, Jim Ed Brown, Skeeter Davis, Jan Howard, Bobby Bare, Johnny Counterfeit, Steve Hall, Sheb Wooley and others.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
